statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id FROM feedback_survey WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_survey WHERE employee_id = 456 AND rating = 2;
SELECT employee_id, rating FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_survey WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC, survey_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM feedback_survey GROUP BY survey_id HAVING max_rating > 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback_survey WHERE employee_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT survey_text FROM employee_surveys WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT survey_text, survey_date FROM employee_surveys WHERE employee_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM employee_surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT employee_id, survey_text FROM employee_surveys WHERE survey_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_description FROM employees INNER JOIN feedback ON employees.employee_id = feedback.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, response_value FROM employees JOIN responses ON employees.employee_id = responses.employee_id WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_department='Sales';
SELECT employee_name, employee_id, employee_department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT surveys.survey_title, responses.response_value FROM surveys JOIN responses ON surveys.survey_id = responses.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT survey_id, survey_score FROM employee_survey ORDER BY survey_score DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_question WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice';
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_response WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, es.survey_score FROM employee e JOIN employee_survey es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id WHERE es.survey_score > 7;
SELECT sq.question_text, sr.response_text FROM survey_question sq JOIN survey_response sr ON sq.question_id = sr.question_id WHERE sr.employee_id = 456;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.email, es.survey_comments FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_survey es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id;
